channel.title: RedemptionX 24/7 VPS hosted, ECO-PKING server *STAFF NEEDED*
channel.description:
[center][b][color=red][size=12pt]Welcome to RedemptionX![/size][/b][/center]
[center]Server Features:[/center] [center]100% combat[/center] [center]100% mini-games (including castlewars)[/center] [center]All specials working[/center] [center]100% skills[/center] [center]100% PKING![/center] [center]Unique home area[/center] [center]Dragon Claws, Korasi sword, Torva, Pernix, Vernix, Kiln Cape - ALL NEW ITEMS -[/center] [center]Easy money making[/center] [center]Fun community[/center] [center]Drop parties every 4 hours[/center] [center]100% Duel Arena[/center] [center]Super stable(holds 250 players)[/center]
[center]Staff:[/center] [center]Owners: Logan, Joey, Jacob[/center] [center]Admins: None[/center] [center]Moderators: None[/center]
